text: John Trumbull (1756–1843) was an American painter active during the American Revolutionary War. John Trumbull may also refer to: *John Trumbull (poet) (1750–1831), a cousin of the painter *John H. Trumbull (1873–1961), American politician, 70th Governor of Connecticut ==See also== *Jonathan Trumbull (1710–1785), American politician, 16th Governor of Connecticut *John Trumble (1863–1944), Australian cricketer
title: John Trumbull (disambiguation)
